title: I Live in the City
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 171 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 300
description: Cities are amazing places to visit and grow up in. Readers will meet four children from around the world and learn about their cities. I Live in the City provides students with supportive text features, including labels, maps, and a glossary, to aid in their understanding of the information in the story. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details and the proper use of adjectives.
meta: amazing, capital, cities, favorite, markets, restaurants
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound and /s/ sound

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
